resources.string:
A nightly wind down routine can help you transition from the busyness of the day to a restful night.

Examples:
• Gentle stretching
• Reading a book
• Listening to calming music
• Journaling your thoughts

Benefits:
• Improves sleep quality
• Reduces stress
• Enhances relaxation
• Promotes a sense of peace

Tips:
• Avoid screens before bed
• Keep a consistent routine
• Create a calming environment
• Reflect on positive moments of the day
